attributes.action: Change the rule of 6 to no include children and stop penalising large families.
attributes.additional_details: Change the rule of 6 to not include children just like Scotland. Never mind being able to go to the pub families should still be able to see and spend time with one another without facing fines the new rules are a joke.
attributes.background: I want the new covid 19 rule of 6 reviewed to not include children under 12. Large families like my own are suffering and unable to see others because of these rules. My children can’t even see there nan but spend 30 hours a weeks mixing with 30 other children.
